developers.currentTitle: Senior UI Engineer at The Azuro Agency
developers.introTagLine: Based in the UK, I'm a front-end developer passionate about building accessible web apps that users love.

aboutMe.intro: Back in 2012, I decided to try my hand at creating custom Tumblr themes and tumbled head first into the rabbit hole of coding and web development. Fast-forward, I’ve had the privilege of building software for an advertising agency, a start-up, a student-led design studio, and a major corporation.
aboutMe.para2: My main focus these days is building products and leading projects for our clients at The Azuro Agency. In my free time I've also released an online video course that covers everything you need to know to build a web app with the Spotify API.
aboutMe.para3: When I’m not at the computer, I’m usually rock climbing, hanging out with my wife and two kids, or running around Atlanta looking for the best eats!

developers.contactMessage: I would love to hear about your project and how I could help. Please fill in the form, and I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
